Class TradeableItemWrapper

java.lang.Object
game.trading.TradeableItemWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
Tradeable
public class TradeableItemWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements Tradeable
A wrapper for items so that they can be traded Implements the Tradeable interface
Author:
Gunnraj Dhaliwal
